location: Ningbo West Street, Zhongzheng District, near Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall MRT (267m)
notes: Newly renovated 4BR/2BA whole-floor apartment on 2F with elevator, balcony, and full furnishings including AC, fridge, washer, and natural gas. Excellent location near MRT and amenities. For a couple with a baby: the 2nd floor with elevator is convenient for strollers; note the no-cooking restriction may be limiting, and the balcony should be checked for railing safety. All rooms have windows suggesting good natural light.
